sentences: Kõige ilusamad rõivad on järgmisel reisil minuga kaasa võetud.
context: The word 'järgmisel' is the adessive case (on/with) form of the Estonian adjective 'järgmine', which means 'next' or 'following'. In this case, it functions as an adverb meaning 'on the next one' or 'at the following time/place'. The '-l' ending indicates location or position, making it equivalent to saying 'on the next day' or 'in the following week' in English.
